articles.title: These dehumidifiers may pose fire risk; 2 million recalled in Canada and U.S. - CTV News
articles.description: The Consumer Product Safety Commission says about 2 million dehumidifiers made by New Widetech are being recalled in North America because they can overheat and catch fire, posing fire and burn hazards.
articles.content:

articles.title: Half of Americans are now fully vaccinated against COVID-19 - Business Insider
articles.description: Cyrus Shahpar, the White House's COVID-19 data director, said the newly vaccinated seven-day average was up 11% from last week and 44% over two weeks.
